title: Tech4Impact - Showcase 2030
content: DePoly presented among leading actors of the sustainable innovation ecosystem in Switzerland!

title: D&I are in our DNA
content: When we say that Diversity and inclusions are the pillars of DePoly culture, we really mean it.

title: Early stage to startups to watch in DACH by Sifted
content: Sifted places DePoly on their list of leading startups in DACH region!

title: Summer Internship for Chemical Engineering students
content: Discover the opportunity of a summer internship at DePoly!

title: SEIF Awards 2020
content: We are delighted to be part of the SEIF Awards Tech for Impact 2020, and win this year’s award in the category of “saleable solutions”.

title: De Vigier Top 10
content: DePoly is proud to be part of A.A De Vigier Stiftung in 2020, and make it to the final!

title: Mass Challenge 2020:
content: DePoly is among the Top 12 finalists of Mass Challenge Switzerland 2020! We are honored and excited! See our CEO, Samantha Anderson, talking about DePoly and our technology.

title: Beauty Tech for Good Challenge by L’Oreal
content: We are delighted to be the winner of the Beauty Tech for Challenge by L’Oreal. We are really excited to work with L’Oreal and be part of their StartUp campus at Station F in Paris.

title: TOP 100 Swiss Startups
content: DePoly was founded earlier this year, and we are proud to be among the TOP 100 Start-Ups in Switzerland, and the youngest company to reach the Top 100. #TOP100SSU.

title: FIT – Fondation pour l’InovationTechnologique.
content: We are delighted to have been awarded a tech seed loan of CHF 100,000 to help takel the issues of plastic waste, pollution and reliance on oil.

title: DePoly Announced in the Top 16 Start-Ups for 2020
content: DePoly is proud to be announced as one of the top 16 start-ups for the 2020 W.A. De Vigier Stiftung Award.

title: Stagars Start Up Documentary
content: The Manuel Stagars Start Up Documentary is now streaming online! The documentary observes early stage entrepreneurs in their labs and shines a light on innovation and entrepreneurship in deep tech without hype. Manuel also interviewed our own Samantha Anderson and Bardiya Valizadeh about life in a Start Up!

title: DePoly Features In Stagars Start-Up Documentary
content: DePoly is proud to announce their participation in the “Start-Up” film buy Manuel Stagars. The film will premier in July 2020

title: DePoly through to VentureKick Stage 2!
content: DePoly: closing the loop on PET recycling.

title: It's Time For The First Green Industrial Revolution
content: DePoly will be attending the World Economic Forum, presenting their vision for sustainable PET Plastic Recycling.

title: Sam Anderson is Interviewed About the Company
content: DePoly’s CEO Samantha Anderson has been interviewed about the company (article in French, video in English)

title: EPFL Talk to DePoly CEO Sam Anderson
content: The EPFL Innovation Park have posted an interview with DePoly’s CEO Samantha Anderson.

title: Vote for DePoly: TOP 100 Swiss Start-Ups 2022
content: Public voting for TOP 100 Swiss Star-Ups 2022 is open!
